Name: UCToolTip
Template: Zoom in/out: Hold Ctrl + Scroll up/down

AfterShow.Name: Start
AfterShow.Source: // change tooltip position to before 'Date Range' Label  	var newElement = document.getElementById('tooltip');    var targetElement = document.getElementById("TEXTBLOCKDATERANGE_RANGETEXT");    var parentElement = targetElement.parentNode;    parentElement.insertBefore(newElement, targetElement);
